servinfo.title: Brake Flexible Hose and Pipe Check
servinfo.ptxt: The brake hose assembly should be checked for road hazard damage, for cracks and chafing of the flexible hose, for leaks and blisters. A light and mirror may be needed for an adequate inspection. If any of the above conditions are observed on the brake flexible hose, it is necessary to replace it.
Inspect the pipe for damage, cracks, dents and corrosion. If any defect is found, replace it.
